common_query.common: select t.* from operate_business_bid_info t where 1=1 and (t.is_void is null or t.is_void=0) and ${conditions}

common_jquery.common: SELECT S.* ã€€FROM (SELECT T1.*, C.CUSTOMER_NAME, T3.ORG_NAME AS CONTRACTOR_OFFICE_NAME, T5.STATE_DESC FROM OPERATE_BUSINESS_BID_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN PRM_CUSTOMER C ON T1.CUSTOMER_ID = C.UUID LEFT JOIN SCDP_ORG T3 ON T1.CONTRACTOR_OFFICE = T3.ORG_CODE LEFT JOIN FM_STATE T5 ON T5.STATE_CODE = T1.Build_Region WHERE (T1.IS_VOID IS NULL OR T1.IS_VOID = 0)) S WHERE ${conditions} and ${selfconditions}
